works.description:
According to the protocol of the DMCA  
(Digital Millennium Copyright Act):


1. We have noted that the  website owned, is offering free downloads of  
various works belonging to Grupo Planeta, and in particular the  
book "Frases en Ingles para Dummies" by Gail Brenner, published by CEAC,  

belonging to Grupo Planeta.

2. Please note that Grupo Planeta is the exclusive holder, through  
different legal entities of the Group members, the rights of the author of
 
numerous works that free download is available on its website and in  
particular, the work cited therefore copying, reproduction, plagiarism,  
distribution and / or publicly performed without our consent not only  
contravenes the provisions of the Copyright Spanish Laws.

3. Planeta DeAgostini Formación, S.L.U., spanish Company, belonging Grupo 

Planeta, CIF B62077938, domiciliated 08034 Barcelona (Spain), Avenida  
Diagonal 662-664, Tel: (+34) 934928164, Fax: (+34) 934928560.

5. We have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials  
described above and included in the service are not authorized by the  
copyright owner, its agent, or the protection of the law.

6. We swear, under penalty of perjury that the information in the  
notification is accurate and that we own the copyright and are therefore  

authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is  
allegedly infringed.

For all the foregoing, I hereby require you to immediately withdraw from  

its website all the works being owned by companies belonging to Grupo  
Planeta, and specifically cited the work as indicated in previous lines,  

leaving distributing them for free.

Sincerely,

Grupo Planeta
Asesoría Jurídica
Avda. Diagonal 662-664, Planta 8ª
08034 Barcelona
Tel.: (+34) 93 492 81 64
Fax: (+34) 93 492 85 64
